sentences.en: By pushing aside unpleasant thoughts they merely repress these thoughts.
sentences.cn: 他们对不愉快的想法不予理会，其结果仅仅是压制了这些想法。

sentences.en: Francis Watson was far from being merely a furniture expert.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西斯·沃森远远不止是个家具行家。

sentences.en: He was not a dishonourable man, he was merely a professional.
sentences.cn: 他不是个不知羞耻的人，他只是个专业人士。

sentences.en: He’s merely a boy – you can’t expect him to understand.
sentences.cn: 他只是个孩子——你不要指望他能理解。

sentences.en: I am merely citing his reaction as typical of British industry.
sentences.cn: 我仅以他为例来说明英国工业界的典型反应。

sentences.en: It is to be hoped that he is merely drumming up business.
sentences.cn: 但愿他只是在招揽生意。

sentences.en: Merely because you believe a thing is right, it isn't automatically so.
sentences.cn: 事情不会仅仅因为你相信它是对的，就会必然如此。

sentences.en: Music is merely an enhancement to the power of her words.
sentences.cn: 音乐只是增强了她话语的力度。

sentences.en: Taxation is not popular in principle, merely acceptable in context.
sentences.cn: 征税基本上是不受欢迎的，在一定情境中才勉强为人接受。

sentences.en: The brain accounts for merely three per cent of body weight.
The King has merely given the politicians enough rope to hang themselves.
sentences.cn: 国王只不过是给了这些政客自缚的绳子。

sentences.en: The letter merely restated the law of the land.
sentences.cn: 这封信只不过重复了一下土地法。

sentences.en: The police don't make the laws, they merely enforce them.
sentences.cn: 警察并不制定法律，只是负责执行。

sentences.en: This merely strengthens our resolve to win the league.
sentences.cn: 这只会更加坚定我们赢得联赛的决心。

sentences.en: When I finally posed the question, "Why?" he merely shrugged.
sentences.cn: 当我最后问“为什么”时，他只是耸了耸肩。

sentences.en: You are merely reciting facts that you have learned by rote.
sentences.cn: 你只是在背诵自己死记硬背下来的东西。

trans.tran_en: used to emphasize how small or unimportant something or someone is
